alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Louisville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville and Moxley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
